model

Class Project

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Project

  • public class Project
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a project created in 2D map builder containing the necessary information
    Since:
    1.2b
    Author:
    Pedro Sampaio

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Project()
      Constructor for projects that are loaded from save files
      Project(Map map, java.util.ArrayList<Tileset> tilesets, int tileSize, int mapSizeX, int mapSizeY)
      Constructor for project class Receives all informations ready
      Project(Tileset tileset, int tileSize, int mapSizeX, int mapSizeY)
      Constructor for new projects Receives informations and create tileset list adding the tileset received in parameter

    • Constructor Detail

      • Project

        public Project(Map map,
               java.util.ArrayList<Tileset> tilesets,
               int tileSize,
               int mapSizeX,
               int mapSizeY)
        Constructor for project class Receives all informations ready
        Parameters:
        map - the map with all layers and tiles information
        tilesets - the list of tilesets contained in the project
        tileSize - the size of the map's tile
        mapSizeX - number of tiles in map on x-axis (columns)
        mapSizeY - number of tiles in map on y-axis (lines)

      • Project

        public Project(Tileset tileset,
               int tileSize,
               int mapSizeX,
               int mapSizeY)
        Constructor for new projects Receives informations and create tileset list adding the tileset received in parameter
        Parameters:
        tileset - the single tile set to create project with
        tileSize - the size of the map's tile
        mapSizeX - number of tiles in map on x-axis (columns)
        mapSizeY - number of tiles in map on y-axis (lines)

      • Project

        public Project()
        Constructor for projects that are loaded from save files
